Package models

Class ModelController

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.ModelController
  • public class ModelController
extends java.lang.Object
    ModelController class.

    Controller class that manages the model of the application. It is responsible for the communication between the view and the model. It contains the main methods that the view can call to interact with the model.

                               exceptions.GroupCellsNotContiguousException,
                               exceptions.TooManyOperandsException
        Method to generate a KenKen.
        Returns:
        The generated KenKen.
        Throws:
        exceptions.CellAlreadyInGroupException - If a cell is already in a group.
        exceptions.CellHasNoGroupException - If a cell has no group.
        exceptions.GroupCellsNotContiguousException - If the cells of a group are not contiguous.
        exceptions.TooManyOperandsException - If there are too many operands.

        private static KenKen fromDTO​(persistence.dto.KenKenDTO dto)

                              exceptions.CellAlreadyInGroupException,
                              exceptions.TooManyOperandsException,
                              exceptions.ValueOutOfBoundsException,
                              exceptions.RewriteFixedPositionException
        Method to convert a DTO to a KenKen.
        Parameters:
        dto - DTO to convert.
        Returns:
        The converted KenKen.
        Throws:
        exceptions.CannotCreateOperationException - If the operation cannot be created.
        exceptions.CellAlreadyInGroupException - If a cell is already in a group.
        exceptions.TooManyOperandsException - If there are too many operands.
        exceptions.ValueOutOfBoundsException - If the value is out of bounds.
        exceptions.RewriteFixedPositionException - If a fixed position is rewritten.
